Draft Rating:

B+

Joe Dumars ranks in the 74th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Dumars's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 5 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Mehmet Okur with 38th pick but was worth 7th pick.
  • Drafted Andre Drummond with 9th pick but was worth 5th pick.
  • Drafted Tayshaun Prince with 23th pick but was worth 5th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Darko Miličić with 2th pick but was worth 36th pick.
  • Drafted Brandon Knight with 8th pick but was worth 49th pick.
  • Drafted Kentavious Caldwell-Pope with 8th pick but was worth 46th pick.

Trade Rating:

C+

Joe Dumars ranks in the 59th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Chucky Atkins, Ben Wallace to DET.
  • Lost Grant Hill to ORL.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Allen Iverson to DET.
  • Lost Chauncey Billups, Antonio McDyess, Cheikh Samb to DEN.

Signing Rating:

F

Joe Dumars ranks in the 18th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Chauncey Billups in 2002.
  • Signed Ben Wallace in 2009.
  • Signed Chris Webber in 2007.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Ben Gordon in 2009.
  • Signed Will Bynum in 2008.
  • Signed Kwame Brown in 2008.
